props.name: columns
props.description: Optional column settings for the table layout

props.name: items
props.description: Array of item definitions. See `k-item` for available options.

props.name: link
props.description: If `false`, all item links will be disabled/removed

props.name: image
props.description: Globale image settings. Will be merged with the image settings of each item. See `k-image-frame` for available options.

props.name: sortable
props.description: If `true`, items are sortable. Each item can disable this individually.

props.name: empty
props.description: Placeholder text and icon for empty state
